.. _`analyzeORF`:

ANALYZEORF
==========

Analyse opend reading frames on switch lists





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_analyze_orf:
        input:
            switch_list = "switch_list.RDS"
        output:
            rds = "switch_list_orf.RDS"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/isoformSwitchAnalyzeR/analyzeORF"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:
  * extra: Optional parameters passed to importIsoformExpression, besides "parentDir"




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
